entry.summary: Appear Pro Hac Vice

entry.title: Minute entry from 2026-01-09 in Huckabee v. Meta Platforms, Inc., 1:23-cv-09152
entry.summary: >>>NOTICE REGARDING DEFICIENT MOTION TO APPEAR PRO HAC VICE. Notice to RE-FILE Document No. 116 MOTION for Scott Poynter to Appear Pro Hac Vice . Filing fee $ 200.00, receipt number ANYSDC-32234080. Motion and supporting papers to be reviewed by Clerk's Office staff... The filing is deficient for the following reason(s): Wrong Judge's initials listed on the documentation; wrong case number on Proposed Order;. Re-file the motion as a Motion to Appear Pro Hac Vice - attach the correct signed PDF - select the correct named filer/filers - attach valid Certificates of Good Standing issued within the past 30 days - attach Proposed Order.. (rju)

entry.title: Entry #116 in Huckabee v. Meta Platforms, Inc., 1:23-cv-09152
entry.summary: FILING ERROR - DEFICIENT DOCKET ENTRY - MOTION for Scott Poynter to Appear Pro Hac Vice . Filing fee $ 200.00, receipt number ANYSDC-32234080. Motion and supporting papers to be reviewed by Clerk's Office staff. Document filed by John Blase, Mike Huckabee, David Kinnaman, Tsh Oxenreider, Relevate Group, Lysa Terkeurst. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit EX A - Affidavit of Scott Poynter, # 2 Exhibit EX B - Certificate of Good Standing, # 3 Exhibit EX C - Proposed Order Granting Motion).(Poynter, Scott) Modified on 1/9/2026 (rju). (Entered: 01/08/2026)

entry.title: Entry #102 in Huckabee v. Meta Platforms, Inc., 1:23-cv-09152
entry.summary: ORDER granting 101 Letter Motion for Extension of Time to Answer. GRANTED. Defendants' deadline to answer the complaint is EXTENDED until January 27, 2026. This Order does not affect other deadlines in this case. SO ORDERED. Bloomberg Finance, L.P. answer due 1/17/2026; Bloomberg L.P. answer due 1/17/2026. (Signed by Judge Margaret M. Garnett on 12/8/2025) (mml) (Entered: 12/09/2025)
